channel.title: Which old source was it?
channel.description:
I remember an old source that was like this.
You spawn with a blue phat, verac brassy, drag legs, and a whip. They had all of the commands (::starter ::barrows ::leet ::pker ) all of those. I want this source really bad, what was it called?!?
I know you can code all of these in by yourself, but I don't know how to do that, anyone remember that source?

item.title: Which old source was it?
item.dc:creator: @hasumon hasumon
item.description:
@hasumon wrote:

What the fuck are you talking about… i dont even have a fucking startercommand in my server we use npc talking much like deltascape but its pimpscape you fag heck i even got a vid where you get your starter rofl! Nawrb

Read full topic

item.title: Which old source was it?

item.description:
@pk3zoi wrote:

Hasumon = fag. Try grabbing any base and taking their ::starter, and editing it to your needs?
